item.title: Denmark Hill SE5 footpath boarding Ruskin Park, 9th August
item.description:
Denmark Hill SE5 footpath boarding Ruskin Park ie comes under Lambeth. On the opposite side of the road for part of this park’s frontage is “Fox on the Hill” public house including beer garden. Opposite this pub and grounds attached pictures taken – about a third of the footpath is either taken away with greenery coming out of the Park or leaf litter with associated litter has accumulated – cut back and sweep up please. This is something like a 150 meter stretch of footpath.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Denmark Hill, Camberwell, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Graffiti (4 new pieces), 9th August
item.description:
4 pieces of graffiti have appeared under and around the bridge area over this week. The form will only allow me to upload 3 pictures at a time, so this report covers 3 pieces (but there's a 4th next to our bins at 1 Bethwin Road too) - will report that seperately

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bethwin Road, Camberwell, London
